General.Name: Shellron Capital Ltd.
General.Description: Shellron Capital Ltd. does not have significant operations. The company focuses on the identification and evaluation of assets or businesses with a view to completing a qualifying transaction. Shellron Capital Ltd. was incorporated in 2021 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
